name: Geometry Defense: Infinite
description: Geometry Defense: Infinite is a classic infinite tower defense game where you must build a maze to slow enemies and build towers to destroy them. An action-packed and engaging game requiring focus to take on challenges and test your skill.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1+ Processor: Dual Core 1.5 GHz+ Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: SM3.0 support w/512MB+ DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 512 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz+ Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: SM3.0 support w/2048MB+ DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 512 MB available space
